title: Assessing the social and environmental impacts of critical mineral supply chains for the energy transition in Europe
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 86

Author(s): Etienne Berthet, Julien Lavalley, Candy Anquetil-Deck, Fernanda Ballesteros, Konstantin Stadler, Ugur Soytas, Michael Hauschild, Alexis Laurent
